title: Goldman Embarking on Third Major Reorganization
itunes:title: Goldman Embarking on Third Major Reorganization
description:
Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek Freelance Reporter Brian Feldman provide the details of Brian's Businessweek story The Game Industry’s NFT Failures Hold Lessons for the Metaverse. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Sri Natarajan explains why Goldman Sachs is shaking up their leadership ranks with another overhaul, the third major reorganization in just four years. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Erik Schatzker recaps Chinese President Xi Jinping’s speech before the people's congress. And we Drive to the Close with David Dietze, Senior Investment Strategist at Peapack Private Wealth Management. Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
